name: Bugzilla
description: Bugzilla 5.0+ has a native REST API, an HTTP version of its XMLRPC and JSONRPC APIs. It is documented along with the other WebServices and Bugzillas internal interfaces. This is the preferred way to interface with Bugzilla from external apps, web or otherwise.

apis.name: Bugzilla
apis.description: These pages document the tip of the HTTP REST API for Bugzilla proxy software (BzAPI). Please file bugs (in either code or documentation) in the BzAPI component in bugzilla.mozilla.org.
